comments.body:
This looks like it could be noarch?
```suggestion
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "
```

diffHunk:

  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "
